tasks.instruction:
Create a task organizer web app with the following features:
1. Task input interface where users can type task names and descriptions
2. Automatic priority sorting algorithm that suggests tasks in order of importance/urgency
3. History feature with an icon that allows users to view tasks from previous days (similar to ChatGPT history)
4. Clean, intuitive UI using Shadcn-ui, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
5. Local storage to persist tasks and history data
6. Task completion tracking and status management
